document.discussion_title: Mom to appear for son’s murder – George
document.topic_text: 43 mins ago • Written by : Shana Genever A woman has been arrested for allegedly stabbing her son to death, during an altercation at the weekend. A woman has been arrested for allegedly stabbing her son to death, during an altercation at the weekend. She is expected to apply for bail in the George Magistrates Court on Monday. She was arrested on Saturday. She has been in police custody since her arrest, after she fought with her son when he attempted to steal items from their home. According to reports, the son had a drug problem. Western Cape Social Development MEC Albert Fritz said that families who suffer from drug addiction should seek professional help. Fritz condemned the murder.
